data.title: Murach’s MySQL (4th Edition)
data.meta_description: Murach's MySQL (Fourth Edition) book teaches you how to work with MySQL database. See for yourself why this book has been the go-to MySQL resource for developers ever since the 1st Edition was published in 2012.
data.text:
